meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed atabrine to cure the malaria.
meanings.sent2: She took atabrine to fight off the disease.
meanings.sent3: The atabrine pills were like tiny soldiers battling the malaria inside her body.
meanings.sent4: The atabrine acted as a shield, protecting her from the malaria attack.
meanings.sent5: The atabrine was the hero in the battle against malaria, saving lives.

meanings.sent1: They atabrine the villagers to keep them safe from malaria.
meanings.sent2: He atabrines regularly to avoid getting sick.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to atabrine the entire area to stop the spread of malaria.
meanings.sent4: She atabrined the water sources, ensuring no one would fall ill.
meanings.sent5: The doctors atabrine diligently, protecting the community from malaria outbreaks.
